steps.notes: Assemble grinding spindle, table drive, column, magnetic chuck
Install spindle motor, table motors, chuck power, coolant pump
Align spindle perpendicularity, level machine base

recipe_def.assumptions: Grinding spindle and magnetic chuck fabricated separately.
recipe_def.notes: Precision surface grinding machine for tight tolerances.

steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cast large machine base from cast iron or steel (600-700 kg raw)
Stress relieve casting to prevent warping
Machine mounting surfaces, T-slots, bolt holes, leveling pads
Grind critical mounting surfaces for flatness and parallelism

recipe_def.assumptions: Cast iron or steel base with precision-ground mounting surfaces. T-slots or bolt patterns for machine mounting.
recipe_def.notes: Large precision machine base for heavy machinery with ground mounting surfaces.

recipe_def.assumptions: Cast spindle housing then grind/finish; bearings assumed imported.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse route; add balancing/assembly steps later.

recipe_def.assumptions: Cast housing/drive parts then machine; bearings/gears assumed imported.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse route; refine with gear/drive specifics later.

steps.notes: Cast steel chuck body and pole pieces
Machine chuck body, pole piece slots, mounting surface
Grind chuck top surface and pole pieces to precision flatness
Wind electromagnetic coils for on/off control
Install coils, pole pieces, wiring, switching mechanism

recipe_def.assumptions: Electromagnetic chuck with switchable magnetic field. Precision-ground top surface for workholding.
recipe_def.notes: Electromagnetic chuck for surface grinder with precision-ground workholding surface.

steps.notes: Assemble grinding spindle, table drive, column, magnetic chuck
Install spindle motor, table motors, chuck power, coolant pump
Align spindle perpendicularity, level machine base

recipe_def.assumptions: Grinding spindle and magnetic chuck fabricated separately.
recipe_def.notes: Precision surface grinding machine for tight tolerances.
